title: Gemstones
body: I was opening chests and got a gemstone, i want the annie skin but what would be the drop rate of gemstones? is it worth it to even save them up or just end up getting goth annie

replies.body: Drop rate of Gemstones is believed to be around 4% based on people opening hundreds upon hundreds of chests for Hextech Annie/ Soulstealer Vayne.
i have so far spent a little more than 100 usd and have only gotten 1 gemstone.

Drop rate is estimated to be about 1 in 25.

I think they're much too rare and/or hextech annie requires far too many to make them, but they're still probably best saved until you can make a skin with them instead of spending them on chests because an individual chest doesn't actually give much value either.

Gemstones are pretty damn rare, so saving up 10 of them could take a while if you're just opening hextech chests from drops post-game. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
